{"step_by_step_thinking": "Topical anesthetics are used to numb the surface of a body part. They can be used to numb the skin before a needle stick, for example. Mepivacaine and Prilocaine are commonly used as injectable local anesthetics, not topical. Between Benzocaine and Tetracaine, Tetracaine is considered to be more potent as a topical anesthetic.", "answer_choice": "D. Tetracaine"}
